fields.title: x
fields.description: The initial `x` position of the player.

fields.title: z
fields.description: The initial `z` position of the player.

fields.title: spreadDistance
fields.description: The distance between players when they spawn. Default: `0.0`.

fields.title: maxRange
fields.description: The furthest distance that players can spawn from each other. Default: `0.0`.

fields.title: victim
fields.description: A player name `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the player.

fields.title: maxHeight
fields.description: The maximum height that players can spawn. Default: `0.0`.

overloads.title: Spread players
overloads.description: Spawn players at a particular `x` and `z` rotation with a defined `distance`, `max range`, and `players`.
